snippet: Judge Scott N. Johansen first ordered a 9-month-old foster child removed from the home of a married couple, and then reversed himself, before disqualifying himself from the case.
abstract: Utah Judge Scott N Johansen disqualifies himself from case of lesbian foster parents April Hoagland and Rebecca Peirce; move comes after Johansen is hit with widespread criticism for ordering baby to be removed from their care and given to heterosexual couple.
lead_paragraph: Judge Scott N. Johansen first ordered a 9-month-old foster child removed from the home of a married couple, and then reversed himself, before disqualifying himself from the case.

headline.main: Utah Judge Withdraws in Lesbians’ Foster Case
headline.print_headline: Utah Judge Withdraws in Lesbians’ Foster Case

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
